__e: And to be honest, I wouldn't parole you if you were the last man here.
We'll call it quits when you're back in Tang San.
He'll kill her if we let him go, if he hasn't already.
That's why you must let me go. Tell me where that wreck is.
Now, all we have to do is find where she stashed them, set them free, and they'll be convinced to leave forever and-- [groaning]
I'll stand behind you, I'll do whatever you want... but you have to let them go and leave my dad alone.
